name: Survivor Road
description: Try to survive on the fiery road as much as you can. The purple flames on the top of the screen will provide the score and timer. Rack up as much points as you can for a high score. The controls are space bar to drive, left arrow to move left, & right arrow to move right. Be careful and try to avoid the opposing cars and the walls as they will slow you down. WARNING if you get hit by a car or wall the screen will emit a quick flash so be careful if you suffer from epilepsy.
